settings.title: Auto Approve Tools
settings.description: Automatically approve tool calls in chat.
settings.info: Skips confirmations for tool usage, including terminal commands.

settings.title: Max Agent Requests
settings.description: Maximum requests before the agent stops.
settings.info: Keeps the agent running without asking you if you want to continue. 500 pretty much guarantees it will never stop and ask.

settings.title: Wrap Code Blocks
settings.description: Toggle word wrap in code blocks.
settings.info: Chat is frequently used in the sidebar where vertical space is constrained. Turning on wrapping makes it so that you don't have to scroll code blocks to read them.

settings.title: Agent Sessions Menu
settings.description: Specify the location for the agent sessions menu.

settings.title: Secondary Sidebar Visibility
settings.description: Default visibility of the Secondary Side Bar.
settings.info: By default the secondary sidebar opens automatically on new projects. Setting it to "hidden" will keep it closed until you manually open it.

settings.title: AI Stats
settings.description: Enable AI statistics in the Copilot menu.
settings.info: View the ammount of manual code vs typing over time. Appears as a progress bar in the bottom status bar area.

settings.title: Coding Agent Tool
settings.description: Enable the GitHub Copilot Coding Agent tool in chat.
settings.info: GitHub Copilot Coding agent can be referenced from chat with #copilotCodingAgent

settings.title: Agent UI Integration
settings.description: Show "Delegate to coding agent button" in chat box.

settings.title: PR Chat (Experimental)
settings.description: Enable experimental chat in GitHub PRs.

settings.title: Agent Auto Commit/Push
settings.description: Allow coding agent to automatically commit & push.
